code: import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import useFetch from'../hooks/useFetch';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectDetails=()=>{const{_id:id}=useParams();const{data:project,error,isPending}=useFetch("/api/projects/".concat(id));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-details",children:[isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error}),project&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"project-detail-description",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{id:"project-detail-description",children:["By: ",project.username]}),project.youtube&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{width:"560",height:"315",src:project.youtube,title:"YouTube video player",frameborder:"0",allow:"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share",allowfullscreen:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:project.body})]})]});};export default ProjectDetails;
